expo.name: Core Plus
expo.description: Nutrition tracking and meal planning app with AI-powered food analysis, recipe discovery, and health integration

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan food items and barcodes for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for voice interactions and food recognition features.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app integrates with HealthKit to track your nutrition data and sync with Apple Health.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app writes nutrition and workout data to Apple Health to provide comprehensive health tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to analyze food images for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to track your activities and provide better health insights.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Core Plus to access your camera to scan food items and barcodes for nutrition tracking.
